name: The Beam Occasional Table by Kelly Hoppen - Davidson
description: Discover the Beam Occasional Table, a masterpiece born from the creative collaboration of Kelly Hoppen for DAVIDSON. This luxury occasional table exudes warmth and sophistication with taupe ash legs and a black lacquered top, designed with versatility and can be used in various settings such as a bedside table, a statement piece in the drawing room, or as an eye-catching entryway statement.
